channel.title: Update executed every 30 mins?
channel.description: Lately all my players disconnect often. So I studied the the console and all the accounts get saved then kicked. Pretty much exactly what the ::update command does when it hits 0. I believe its being run every 30 minutes. What can I do about this?

item.title: Update executed every 30 mins?
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

Lately all my players disconnect often. So I studied the the console and all the accounts get saved then kicked. Pretty much exactly what the ::update command does when it hits 0.
I believe its being run every 30 minutes. What can I do about this?

Read full topic
